data.message: How do I close/remove my FB account?

replies.message: Hi RosaLinda. If you don't think you'll use Facebook again, you can request to have your account permanently deleted. Please keep in mind that you won't be able to reactivate your account or retrieve anything you've added. Learn more: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/224562897555674 -Chantal

Hi ive been Blocked with my real name because of Facebook thinks i am fake since yeaterday ive been senden my driverslicence may 50 times but theres nothing changed with my account wtf is going on ? If you wont activate my account because of my Turkish name Then delete it that wil be à reason to go to THE court .
